title: Fujitsu: We have moral obligation to compensate Post Office victims
description: Bosses including the global CEO of the firm behind the faulty Horizon IT system apologise to victims.

title: Watch: The real Mr Bates speaks to MPs about Post Office scandal
description: The former sub-postmaster, who came to fame when portrayed in an ITV drama, explains compensation delays.

title: UK weather: Schools close as Arctic blast brings snow and ice
description: Conditions led to more than 100 school closures in Scotland, with further snow warnings in place.

title: Young drivers face Â£3,000 cost for car insurance
description: Inflation and repairs have sent quotes soaring for younger motorists, according to data.

title: UK councils most in debt revealed
description: The Public Accounts Committee warns of an "extreme and long-lasting effect" on public services.

title: US condemns Iran for 'reckless' missile strikes on northern Iraq
description: Iran says it launched missiles at Israeli "spy headquarters" in the northern Iraqi city of Irbil.

title: Cody Fisher's nightclub killing 'was planned retribution'
description: Three men are accused of murdering Cody Fisher in a Birmingham nightclub on Boxing Day 2022.

title: Cloned rhesus monkey created to speed medical research
description: Researchers say it will speed up drug testing but animal rights campaigners have grave concerns.

title: Brits living abroad for more than 15 years get election vote
description: The rule change will see around two million more people eligible to register for a vote.

title: Seven giant tortoises found dead in woodland near Exeter
description: Police are investigating the "unusual" find and are asking for the public's help.
